arStrings.szText: You deal {c_number}[{SF_2}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage to enemies affected by {c_important}Petrify{/c}. Against Bosses, the Critical Strike Damage bonus is increased to {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%x|]{/c} and its duration is increased to {c_number}{buffduration:BUFF_PETRIFIED_BOSS_CRIT}{/c} seconds.

Killing an enemy affected by {c_important}Petrify{/c} reduces its Cooldown by {c_number}{SF_5}{/c} second. Hitting a Boss with {c_important}Petrify{/c} reduces its Cooldown by {c_number}{SF_9}{/c} seconds.
